title: "Neural Color Wallpaper"
content:
**Welcome to Neural Color Wallpaper!**

Our website offers a unique collection of wallpapers featuring simple graphics of neural networks against complementary color backgrounds. These wallpapers are perfect for anyone interested in the intersection of technology and design, and want to add a touch of sophistication to their desktop or mobile device.

Our selection includes a variety of colors and styles to fit any taste or mood. Whether you're looking for a calming blue background or an energizing red one, we've got you covered. Each wallpaper is carefully designed to create a harmonious balance between the neural network graphic and the background color.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download in high resolution, so you can enjoy them on any device. We also offer custom sizing options to ensure a perfect fit for your screen.

Join our community of tech-savvy design enthusiasts and elevate your digital space with Neural Color Wallpaper!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
